subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Teemu Selanne beat goalie Marc-Andre Fleury midway through the third period for his 656th career goal, and the Anaheim Ducks beat Pittsburgh, 2-1.
snippet: Teemu Selanne beat goalie Marc-Andre Fleury midway through the third period for his 656th career goal, and the Anaheim Ducks beat Pittsburgh, 2-1.
